item.title: Version 1.0.7
item.description:
What's New in SaneHosts 1.0.7

  • Menu bar now shows green/red status indicators for active protection
  • Fixed: "Open SaneHosts" now brings existing window to front instead of opening duplicates
  • Window opens to your active profile instead of always showing the first one
  • Faster app launch â€” reduced hosts file parsing time dramatically
  • Network timeout added for blocklist fetches to prevent hangs
  • Updated Kitchen Sink preset description
